option.od: print the help message and exit.
filename of the raw (dat) format file.
filename of the fit format file to create.
filename of the associated index file to create.
input file is in rawacf file format and the output should be in fitacf file format.
filename of the rawacf format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Creates a fit or fitacf format file from a raw (dat) or radwacf format file.

description.p: Creates a fit or fitacf format file from a raw (dat) or radwacf format file.
If the "-new" option is specified then the fitacf format file is written to standard output.

example.description: Generates a fit file from the dat file "19971020.gbr.dat" to produce a file called "19971020.gbr.fit" and an index file called "19971020.gbr.inx".
Generates a fit file from the dat file "19981105.kap.rawacf" to produce a file called "19981105.kap.fitacf". Status is logged on standard error.
